com.atc.simulator.display

Class DisplayApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationAdapter
      • com.atc.simulator.display.DisplayApplication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataPlaybackListener, PredictionListener, ApplicationListener

    public class DisplayApplication
extends ApplicationAdapter
implements DataPlaybackListener, PredictionListener
    The DisplayApplication for the Simulator - Uses LibGDX KEYs: - T: tracks - Space: pause/play - P: cycle prediction display method

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  DisplayApplication.AircraftDatabase
      private class for storing AircraftModel associated with the SystemStateDatabase, and to keep them in sync with the systemstatedatabase.
      private class  DisplayApplication.MyCameraController
      Private camera controller class to allow us to zoom and pan the map.
      private class  DisplayApplication.SimulationController
      Private class that handles the Input from User
